      • DefaultPlayerFactory

        public DefaultPlayerFactory(android.app.Application application,
                    DeezerConnect deezerConnect,
                    NetworkStateChecker networkStateChecker)
                     throws OAuthException,
                            DeezerError
        Builds a factory.
        Parameters:
        application - the current application.
        deezerConnect - a deezerConnect object with a Deezer OAuth Token set and associated to a user.
        networkStateChecker - a component able to monitor network availability.
        Throws:
        DeezerError - deezerConnect is not properly initialized.
        OAuthException - if deezerConnect's token is not valid.
